items.hint: You had to attend an attendance centre for a set number of hours
items.label: Attendance centre order

items.hint: You were given treatment to help you stop taking drugs
items.label: Drug rehabilitation

items.hint: You were given help to understand the effect your crime had on someone
items.label: Reparation order

items.hint: A court ruled that you pose a risk of causing sexual harm
items.label: Sexual harm prevention order

items.hint: A court ruled that you breached a civil injunction (previously called an ASBO)
items.label: Supervision order on breach of a civil injunction

items.hint: You were given an order that had a requirement - for example, curfew, probation or supervision
items.label: Youth rehabilitation order
